content: granny squares are never going out of style the granny square ruffle bookmark is a quick and fun make these are perfect for gifting with your favorite book or with a gift card to a bookstore while designed with size 10 cotton crochet thread and a 2 5 mm hook you can really create these with any size yarn and hook to make even taking a break from reading look good indulge in the timeless charm of the granny square ruffle bookmark a delightful crochet pattern that combines classic techniques with a modern twist this easy-level project is perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike offering a quick and satisfying make worked in the round the granny square motif creates a lovely textured base for the playful ruffle edging add a touch of whimsy with the optional tassel or pompom making each bookmark uniquely yours **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels crochet in the round for seamless construction granny square motif adds texture and visual interest optional tassel or pompom for customization clear written instructions for easy following **materials needed-** hook 2 5mm but you can use any size hook yarn curio #10 thread weight 20-30 yards --you can use any weight thread or yarn
